title: In the closet: Look inside Jennifer Aniston's huge walk-in wardrobe
text:
It would have been Rachel Green's fantasy dressing room.

Stylist sisters Nina and Clare Hallworth shared a picture of their client Jennifer Aniston apparently posing in her walk-in closet to Instagram on Tuesday, delighting fans.

The image showed the Friends star, who recently joined the photo sharing site herself, striking a pose in a black trench coat and strappy sandals.

Incredible: Jennifer Aniston's stylists give fans a peek inside star's astonishing walk in closet, posting this picture to Instagram on Tuesday

But it was the out of this world closet that impressed fans, who marveled at the incredible storage room.

Featuring three separate bespoke closets, leading off a main walkway, the room was a fashion-lover's dream.

While the photo focused on Jennifer, it was the view behind her that intrigued.

The triple closet featured minimalist doorless pine shelving. Three shelves, holding sweaters, bags and clutches, were situated over waist-high clothing rails.

Walk on by: Jennifer has previously posed in the closet for an image posted by the sisters Instagram account prior to the Golden Globes

Jennifer has previously posed in the closet for an image posted by the sisters Instagram account prior to the Golden Globes. On that occasion, the photo showed a glimpse of an accessories display, with the individual shelves placed behind glass doors and lit from above.

Five years ago, Jennifer's then-husband Justin Theroux spoke of the actress had turned the garage of her $20million Bel Air home into a walk in closet.

Talking to Ryan Seacrest, the New Yorker explained: 'We have made an extension on our house. I don't know what [was] made into what, but we found more room to create a better bathroom and a closet.

'It sounds probably more elaborate than it is, but basically when we were out of town—she was working, I was working—we took that opportunity to create a little more closet space.'

Loyal to her team: Stylist Clare Hallworth is seen with Jennifer back in 2011

When it comes to red carpet dressing, Jennifer is loyal to her tried and trusted team.

Along with Nina and Clare, with whom she has worked for many years, she has long relied on hairstylist Chris McMillan and makeup artist Angela Levin.

The 50-year-old actress sparked a sensation earlier this week when she revealed she had joined Instagram and posted a reunion picture of the Friends cast.

But it seems it wasn't her first experience of the 'social media pool' as she wanted to understand how it all worked before she was ready to go public.

Working together: Nina Hallworth and Clare Hallworth pictured last year

She confessed on Jimmy Kimmel Live!: 'It was a stalker account.

'When I was thinking about doing this, I sort of figured it was time to kind of understand the world and dip my toe into the social media pool.'

The Morning Show actress broke the Guinness World Record for the fastest time to reach 1million followers after sharing a selfie with her former 'Friends' castmates on Tuesday, taking just five hours and 16 minutes to amass the milestone, and she now has over 11 million watching her posts.

Alongside the blurry selfie, Jennifer wrote: 'And now we're Instagram FRIENDS too. HI INSTAGRAM.'

First post: Jennifer shared this Instagram image as she joined the site this week

Jennifer has already mocked the glitches she caused on Instagram with her surge in popularity with a spoof video.

She captioned the clip: 'I swear I didn't mean to break it. Thank you guys for the kind, glitchy welcome.'

The Cake star had hinted a few days ago that she was thinking about joining Instagram because she likes the 'control' over her life it would offer her.

She teased: '[On social media] you can actually have a little bit more control over the narrative that's out there. [You can] right some wrongs and some silly things that, God knows, are said often. Maybe [I'll join]. You never know.'
description: It would have been Rachel Green's fantasy dressing room.
